00030 /**
00031  * Frontend template
00032  *
00033  * @author      Jean-David Gadina <macmade@eosgarden.com>
00034  * @version     1.0
00035  * @package     TYPO3
00036  * @subpackage  oop
00037  */
00038 class tx_oop_Frontend_Template implements ArrayAccess
00039 {
00040     /**
00041      * A flag to know wether the needed static variables are set
00042      */
00043     private static $_hasStatic  = false;
00044     
00045     /**
00046      * The instance of the string utilities class (tx_oop_String_Utils)
00047      */
00048     protected static $_str      = NULL;
00049     
00050     /**
00051      * The instance of the tslib_cObj class
00052      */
00053     protected $_cObj            = NULL;
00054     
00055     /**
00056      * The template resource
00057      */
00058     protected $_templateContent = NULL;
00059     
00060     /**
00061      * The template sections
00062      */
00063     protected $_sections        = array();
00064     
00065     /**
00066      * Class constructor
00067      * 
00068      * @param   tslib_cObj  The instance of tslib_cObj
00069      * @param   string      The path to the template file
00070      * @return  NULL
00071      */
00072     public function __construct( tslib_cObj $cObj, $templateFilePath )
00073     {
00074         if( !self::$_hasStatic ) {
00075             
00076             self::_setStaticVars();
00077         }
00078         
00079         // Stores the content object
00080         $this->_cObj = $cObj;
00081         
00082         // Initializes the template content object
00083         $this->_initTemplate( ( string )$templateFilePath );
00084     }
00085     
00086     /**
00087      * 
00088      */
00089     public function __get( $name )
00090     {
00091         // Ensures we have a string
00092         $name = ( string )$name;
00093         
00094         // Checks if the section already exist
00095         if( !isset( $this->_sections[ $name ] ) ) {
00096             
00097             // Creates a new section
00098             $this->_sections[ $name ] = new tx_oop_Frontend_Template_Section( $name, $this->_cObj, $this->_templateContent );
00099         }
00100         
00101         // Returns the template section
00102         return $this->_sections[ $name ];
00103     }
00104     
00105     /**
00106      * 
00107      */
00108     public function __set( $name, $value )
00109     {
00110         $this->_sections[ $name ] = ( string )$value;
00111     }
00112     
00113     /**
00114      * 
00115      */
00116     public function __isset( $name )
00117     {
00118         return isset( $this->_sections[ $name ] );
00119     }
00120     
00121     /**
00122      * 
00123      */
00124     public function __unset( $name )
00125     {
00126         unset( $this->_sections[ $name ] );
00127     }
00128     
00129     /**
00130      * 
00131      */
00132     public function __toString()
00133     {
00134         $content = '';
00135         
00136         foreach( $this->_sections as $key => $value ) {
00137             
00138             $content .= self::$_str->NL
00139                      .  '<!-- Start of template section \'' . $key . '\' -->'
00140                      .  self::$_str->NL
00141                      .  ( string )$value
00142                      .  self::$_str->NL
00143                      .  '<!-- End of template section \'' . $key . '\' -->'
00144                      .  self::$_str->NL;
00145         }
00146         
00147         return $content;
00148     }
00149     
00150     /**
00151      * 
00152      */
00153     public function offsetGet( $name )
00154     {
00155         return $this->$name;
00156     }
00157     
00158     /**
00159      * 
00160      */
00161     public function offsetSet( $name, $value )
00162     {
00163         $this->$name = $value;
00164     }
00165     
00166     /**
00167      * 
00168      */
00169     public function offsetExists( $name )
00170     {
00171         return isset( $this->$name );
00172     }
00173     
00174     /**
00175      * 
00176      */
00177     public function offsetUnset( $name )
00178     {
00179         unset( $this->$name );
00180     }
00181     
00182     /**
00183      * 
00184      */
00185     private static function _setStaticVars()
00186     {
00187         self::$_str       = tx_oop_String_Utils::getInstance();
00188         self::$_hasStatic = true;
00189     }
00190     
00191     /**
00192      * Loads a template file.
00193      * 
00194      * This function reads a template file and store it as a
00195      * C-Object.
00196      * 
00197      * @param   string  The path of the template file to load
00198      * @return  NULL
00199      */
00200     protected function _initTemplate( $templateFilePath )
00201     {
00202         // Checks if the template file exists
00203         if( !file_exists( tx_oop_Typo3_Utils::getSystemPath( $templateFilePath ) ) ) {
00204             
00205             // The template file does not exist
00206             throw new tx_oop_Frontend_Template_Exception(
00207                 'The template file does not exist (path: ' . $templateFilePath . ')',
00208                 tx_oop_Frontend_Template_Exception::EXCEPTION_TEMPLATE_NOT_FOUND
00209             );
00210         }
00211         
00212         // Loads and stores the template file
00213         $this->_templateContent = $this->_cObj->fileResource( $templateFilePath );
00214     }
00215 }
